abstract: The tech reporters and editors of The New York Times are always searching for interesting items on the Web. Here’s what they found on Friday.
snippet: The tech reporters and editors of The New York Times are always searching for interesting items on the Web. Here’s what they found on Friday.
lead_paragraph: Here’s what the tech reporters and editors at The New York Times have been reading on the Web. For more, go to the right column of this page.

headline.main: Today’s Scuttlebot: War Propaganda and Facebook Fury
